languages.text: Губернатор Райкада Минорис руководит освобождением планеты из укрепленного бункера. Единственный путь туда пролегает через Верхний проспект, захваченный бунтовщиками.

traits.locale_text: Губернатор Райкада Минорис руководит освобождением планеты из укрепленного бункера. Единственный путь туда пролегает через широкий проспект, захваченный бунтовщиками.

languages.text: The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. To reach it, the Rogue Trader will have to traverse the Upperway, which is controlled by the rebels.
languages.original_text: Губернатор Райкада Минорис руководит освобождением планеты из укрепленного бункера. Единственный путь туда пролегает через Верхний проспект, захваченный бунтовщиками.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris governor commands the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. The only way to reach it is through the Star Thoroughfare, controlled by the rebels.
The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. The only way to reach it is through the Star Thoroughfare, which is controlled by the rebels.
The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. The only way to reach it is through the Star Thoroughfare, which is controlled by the rebels.

languages.text: Der Gouverneur von Rykad Minoris befehligt die planetaren Streitkräfte aus einem befestigten Bunker heraus. Um diesen zu erreichen, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den von den Rebellen kontrollierten Oberweg passieren.
languages.original_text: The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. To reach it, the Rogue Trader will have to traverse the Upperway, which is controlled by the rebels.

traits.locale_text: Der Gouverneur von Rykad Minoris befehligt die planetaren Streitkräfte aus einem befestigten Bunker heraus. Um diesen zu erreichen, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den von den Rebellen kontrollierten Oberweg passieren.

languages.text: Le gouverneur de Rykad Minoris dirige les forces planétaires depuis un bunker fortifié. Pour l'atteindre, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} va devoir traverser la Voie supérieure, actuellement contrôlée par les rebelles.
languages.original_text: The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. To reach it, the Rogue Trader will have to traverse the Upperway, which is controlled by the rebels.

traits.locale_text: Le gouverneur de Rykad Minoris dirige les forces planétaires depuis un bunker fortifié. Le seul moyen de l'atteindre est de passer par la Voie Étoilée, sous contrôle rebelle.

languages.text: ライカド・ミノリスの総督は、要塞化されたバンカーから惑星軍を指揮している。自由開拓者がそこへ到達するには、反乱軍が支配する上通りを越えなければならない。
languages.original_text: The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. To reach it, the Rogue Trader will have to traverse the Upperway, which is controlled by the rebels.

traits.locale_text: ライカド・ミノリスの総督は、要塞化されたバンカーから惑星軍を指揮している。自由開拓者がそこへ到達するには、反乱軍が支配する上通りを越えなければならない。

languages.text: El gobernador de Rykad Minoris dirige las fuerzas de defensa planetarias desde un búnker fortificado. Para llegar a él, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente deberá atravesar la Vía Superior, actualmente en manos de los rebeldes.
languages.original_text: The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. To reach it, the Rogue Trader will have to traverse the Upperway, which is controlled by the rebels.

traits.locale_text: El gobernador de Rykad Minoris dirige las fuerzas de defensa planetarias desde un búnker fortificado. La única forma de llegar es por el Paso Estelar, que está en manos de los rebeldes.

languages.text: 小莱卡德的总督正在坚固的地堡里指挥行星防御部队。若要抵达地堡，行商浪人必须穿过被叛乱分子控制的上层街道。
languages.original_text: The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. To reach it, the Rogue Trader will have to traverse the Upperway, which is controlled by the rebels.

traits.locale_text: 小莱卡德的总督正在坚固的地堡里指挥行星防御部队。抵达地堡的唯一途径，就是穿过由叛乱分子控制的流星大道。

languages.text: Rykad Minoris valisi, gezegen kuvvetlerini müstahkem bir sığınaktan komuta ediyor. Hür Tacir'in oraya ulaşabilmesi için, isyancıların kontrolündeki Üst Yol'u aşması gerek.
languages.original_text: The governor of Rykad Minoris is commanding the planetary forces from a fortified bunker. To reach it, the Rogue Trader will have to traverse the Upperway, which is controlled by the rebels.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris valisi, gezegen kuvvetlerini müstahkem bir sığınaktan komuta ediyor. Hür Tacir'in oraya ulaşabilmesi için, isyancıların kontrolündeki Üst Yol'u aşması gerek.
